item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0432; 05:15AM; 4367 W Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pJ7GtB; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first assignment of 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes (prior to arrival of the additional resources). Further update on the building appears to be divided into two units with a partition wall separating areas within one unit. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending beyond the original unit (the extent of potential smoke/water damage is unknown at this time). LAPD has one male (age unknown) in custody as a potential arson suspect. Firefighter/paramedics are evaluating him to ensure there are no injuries. No further updates. ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E226 E229 E26 E294 E34 E68 EM11 RA68 RA834 RA94 T26 T29 T94; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0432; 04:48AM; 4367 W Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pJ7GtB; Jefferson Park; One story commercial building (one building divided into three units) with fire showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E229 E26 E294 E34 E68 EM11 RA68 RA834 RA94 T29 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1769; 10:26PM; 5357 W San Vicente Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mIOOcg; Mid-Wilshire; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes. Crews contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending adjacent units from damage. The primary and secondary search located no occupants and no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 E226 E229 E26 E261 E68 RA29 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1769; 10:10PM; 5357 W San Vicente Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mIOOcg; Mid-Wilshire; Three story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit on the top floor. One additional task force requested.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 E229 E261 E68 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0366; 08:25AM; 13316 W Corcoran St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zceD9y; Pacoima; KNOCKDOWN: *Address Updated* 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews worked quickly to prevent the fire from extending into the abutted structure. No other buildings damaged. A primary and secondary search found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E91 RA91 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0366; 08:06AM; 11800 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eG5vRm; Pacoima; Detached garage with heavy fire showing and impinging on an exposed structure. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0117; 02:11AM; 7518 N Jamieson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FFpStv; #Reseda; 19 Firefighters took just 29 minutes to fully extinguish heavy fire in a garage attic area, preventing flames from spreading into the attached one story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E290 E73 RA73 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0117; 01:42AM; 7518 N Jamieson Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FFpStv; #Reseda; Fire in the attic area of a garage attached to a one-story home.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E290 E73 RA73 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1033; 04:10PM; 369 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/32IyVLO; #BeverlyGrove; Man attempting to parallel park vehicle near (unidentified) restaurant drove his vehicle onto curb, allegedly striking (grazing?) two pedestrians, who were examined and released at scene. Contrary to the preliminary report (from 9-1-1 callers), the vehicle did NOT strike the building or enter any business. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #2187); FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E261 RA61 RA861 T61; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1037; 03:47PM; 222 E 5th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mKcyN4; Downtown; 33 LAFD Firefighters took just 15 minutes (4:02 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one (yet unidentified) unit in a row of one story businesses. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E2 E209 E210 E9 RA209 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
